title: Sale of Bare Land in Colombo 3
details:
The perfect bare land for your business with a highly commercial neighborhood. This land is on 24 perches ( ONE WAY ROAD ACCESS), Ready for you to construct. Suitable location, also being an Ideal investment for a brighter future.

Located Inbetween Alwis Place & Sir James Peiris Mawatha Colombo 3 .

Schools, Banks, Hospitals, Restaurants and other basic amenities within close range

Price - 14 Million P/P ( Non Negotiable )

Wide road frontage of over 20 feet;

Genuine inquiries only ( Strictly No Time Wasters / Agents )

Contact - 0094 77 449 3020
